src:
Tinder rande sa pre ňu stalo nočnou morou: Najskôr ju partner zaškrtil, potom pozeral porno a zisťoval, ako sa zbaviť tela
06 Nov 2019, 11:56 by Timea Krauszová

Smrť dievčiny ho nerozhodila, na ďalší deň šiel znovu na rande, pričom mal telo stále u seba v byte.

Mladá Angličanka Grace mala len 22 rokov, keď sa rozhodla precestovať svet. Po šiestich týždňoch v Južnej Amerike navštívila Nový Zéland. Cestovala sama. Jeden večer si chcela spríjemniť spoločnosťou mladíka, ktorého spoznala cez Tinder.
Po niekoľkých hodinách sa rozhodla stráviť noc v byte novej známosti. Muž ju však podľa obžaloby zaškrtil a neskôr aj pochoval. Tvrdí, že je nevinný, smrť mala údajne nastať po tvrdom sexe, ktorý zahŕňal škrtenie a údery. Píše BBC.
Rande bolo podľa všetkého fajn
Svedčia o tom videozábery, na ktorých sa dvojica bozkáva, ako aj fakt, že vystriedali niekoľko barov. Všetko nasvedčuje tomu, že so sexom obaja súhlasili. Podľa BBC rodičia zosnulej Grace o nej hovorili ako o priateľskej a otvorenej osobe, ktorá ľahko nadväzuje nové vzťahy.
Pôvodne sa obhajoba (meno obvineného nie je známe) bránila tým, že po niekoľkých drinkoch šli obaja domov. Neskôr mladík svoju výpoveď zmenil, teraz tvrdí, že šli k nemu domov a zhodli sa na tvrdom sexe. Obvinený muž neskôr údajne zaspal v sprche, po prebudení si šiel ľahnúť. Nehybné telo svojej partnerky si všimol až ráno.



Stopy na tele a kompromitujúca história prehliadača
Podľa stôp na Gracinom tele bola priviazaná a zaškrtená. Odhliadnuc od týchto dôkazov, Google história mladíka mu v obhajobe vôbec nepomáha. Vyhľadával rôzne spôsoby, ako sa zbaviť tela. Podľa prokurátora ho smrť mladej ženy vôbec nerozhodila. Zapol si totiž porno.
Scéna ako z najhoršej nočnej mory tu zďaleka nekončí. Pozeranie filmov pre dospelých prerušil, aby si mohol nahé mŕtve telo nafotiť. Neskôr sa k pornu vrátil, napokon hľadal „veľké tašky v okolí“ a „rigor mortis“ (posmrtná stuhnutosť). Aby toho nebolo málo, na ďalší deň, napriek tomu, že Gracino mŕtve telo bolo naďalej v jeho byte, si vyrazil na ďalšie Tinder rande.
Neskôr Grace pochoval za mestom, kde ju o pár dní na to aj našli. Súdny proces naďalej pokračuje, podľa BBC to bude trvať približne mesiac.

ĎALŠIE ČLÁNKY, KTORÉ BY ŤA MOHLI ZAUJÍMAŤ
text:
Tinder's date became a nightmare for her: First, a partner strangled her, then watched porn, and discovered how to get rid of her body
06 Nov 2019, 11:56 by Timea Krauszova

The girl's death did not resolve him, the next day he went on a date again, with his body still in his apartment.

Grace, a young English woman, was only 22 years old when she decided to travel the world. After six weeks in South America she visited New Zealand. She traveled alone. One evening, she wanted to make the young man she met through Tinder more enjoyable.
After several hours she decided to spend the night in a new acquaintance apartment. The man, however, according to the indictment strangled and later buried. He claims to be innocent, death supposedly occurred after hard sex, which involved strangulation and strokes. He writes to the BBC.
The dating seems to be fine
This is evidenced by the video footage of the couple kissing, as well as the fact that they replaced several bars. Everything suggests that they both agreed to sex. According to the BBC, the late Grace's parents referred to her as a friendly and open person who easily made new relationships.
Originally, the defense (the name of the accused is unknown) was prevented by the fact that after a few drinks they both went home. Later the young man changed his testimony, now claiming that they went to his home and agreed on hard sex. The accused man later allegedly overslept in the shower, after waking up he went to bed. He did not notice his partner's still body until the morning.



Traces on the body and compromising browser history
According to the traces on Grace's body, she was tied and ticked. Apart from this evidence, Google's history of a young man does not help him at all. He was looking for different ways to get rid of the body. According to the prosecutor, the death of a young woman did not throw him at all. You have porn.
The scene like the worst nightmare is far from over here. He stopped watching adult movies so he could shoot a naked dead body. He later returned to porn, eventually looking for “big bags around” and “rigor mortis”. To make matters worse, the next day, even though Grac's dead body was still in his apartment, he went on another Tinder date.
Later Grace was buried outside the city, where she was found a few days later. The lawsuit continues, according to the BBC, it will take about a month.
